name: Internet Connectivity
description: Checks external internet access via multiple endpoints.
check_cmd: if curl -fs --max-time 5 https://1.1.1.1 >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo active; elif curl -fs --max-time 5 https://8.8.8.8 >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo active; elif curl -fs --max-time 5 https://cloudflare.com >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo active; elif ping -c1 -W3 1.1.1.1 >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo active; else echo inactive; fi
fix_cmd: echo 'Internet connectivity lost'; if command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then systemctl restart NetworkManager 2>/dev/null || systemctl restart networking 2>/dev/null || true; fi; ip route show | head -5
verify_cmd: ping -c3 -W2 1.1.1.1 2>/dev/null && echo 'Connectivity restored' || ping -c3 -W2 8.8.8.8 2>/dev/null && echo 'Connectivity restored' || echo 'Still offline'
